results.title: Significant effect of simvastatin and/or ezetimibe-loaded nanofibers on the healing of femoral defect: An experimental study.
results.journal: Mater Sci Eng C Mater Biol Appl
results.text_hl: Significant effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and/or @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@-loaded nanofibers on the healing of @<m>DISEASE_Femoral_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005266 @@@femoral defect@@@: An experimental study.

results.title: An intelligent phase transformation system based on lyotropic liquid crystals for sequential biomolecule delivery to enhance bone regeneration.
results.text_hl: The in vivo @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Femoral_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005266 @@@femoral defect@@@ models have witnessed the prominent angiogenic and osteogenic effects induced by the sequential presentation of @CHEMICAL_Deferoxamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003676 @@@DFO@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@.

citations.NLM: Li R, Zhang J, Shi J, Yue J, Cui Y, Ye Q, Wu G, Zhang Z, Guo Y, Fu D. An intelligent phase transformation system based on lyotropic liquid crystals for sequential biomolecule delivery to enhance bone regeneration. J Mater Chem B. 2023 Mar 30;11(13):2946-2957. PMID: 36916173

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on plasma lipoproteins and response to arterial injury in wild-type and apolipoprotein-E-deficient mice.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: Wild-type (WT) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ (n = 40) and hyperlipidemic @GENE_APOE @GENE_11816 @@@apolipoprotein-E@@@-deficient (apoE(-/-)) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ (n = 40) received normal chow or chow containing @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 100 mg/kg/day prior to bilateral @<m>DISEASE_Femoral_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005266 @@@femoral artery@@@ wire injury.

citations.NLM: Choudhury RP, Carrelli AL, Stern JD, Chereshnev I, Soccio R, Elmalem VI, Fallon JT, Fisher EA, Reis ED. Effects of simvastatin on plasma lipoproteins and response to arterial injury in wild-type and apolipoprotein-E-deficient mice. J Vasc Res. 2004 Jan-Feb;41(1):75-83. PMID: 14752252
